rainfalls:
Heavy Rainfall Warning No. 4 #NCR_PRSD

Weather System: Southwest Monsoon (Habagat)

Issued at: 8:00 AM, 08 June 2025(Sunday)



YELLOW WARNING LEVEL: Nueva Ecija, Tarlac, Pampanga, Bulacan, Metro Manila, Rizal, Laguna, Batangas, Cavite and Quezon(General Nakar, Infanta, Real, Panukulan, Burdeos, Polillo, Patnanungan, Jomalig, Mauban, Lucban, Dolores, Sariaya, Candelaria, Tiaong, San Antonio, Tayabas, Sampaloc, Pagbilao, Lucena).

ASSOCIATED HAZARD: Possible FLOODING in flood-prone areas.





Meanwhile, expect light to moderate rains over Bataan and Quezon(Agdangan, Alabat, Buenavista, Calauag, Catanauan, General Luna, Guinayangan, Gumaca, Lopez, Macalelon, Mulanay, Padre Burgos, Perez, Pitogo, Plaridel, Quezon, San Andres, San Francisco, San Narciso, Tagkawayan, Unisan, Atimonan) within the next 3 hours.

Light to moderate with occasional heavy rains affecting Zambales which may persist within 3 hours.

The public and the Disaster Risk Reduction and Management Offices concerned are advised to MONITOR the weather condition and watch for the next warning to be issued at 11:00 AM today.

For more information and queries, please call telephone numbers 8927-1335 and 8927-2877 or log on to www.pagasa.dost.gov.ph.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Watch #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 10:00 AM, 08 June 2025



Thunderstorm is MORE LIKELY to develop over Greater Metro Manila Area(Metro Manila, Bulacan, Rizal, Laguna and Cavite) within 12 hours. 



All are advised to continue monitoring for updates.
